channel.title: Problem connecting to my own server! HELP PLEASE!
channel.description:
I am frustrated abwt this! Other people can connect to my server, but when I use the real client it says connection error
But i lived with an alternate client which glitches, (name changes and head bangs around) but i sticked with it.
Now idk why i cant connect with either client!
Help please! www.numbascape.smfforfree.com is the site! I need coders and players, many staff spots!

item.title: Problem connecting to my own server! HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @donlothario donlothario
item.description:
@donlothario wrote:

how do i portforward? im not using wireless :S[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2009, 11:52:23 am[/size][hr]btw i can connect, except i cant use the real client but i can connect with my old cliennt

item.title: Problem connecting to my own server! HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

If other players can connect then his internal ip is incorrect, try using the default host of 0.0.0.0.

item.title: Problem connecting to my own server! HELP PLEASE!

item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

Can I just point out to you that you have advertised and that is against forum rules.

Also it is simple, just port forward again, you may of got it wrong.
